knimeNode.name: VEPFilter
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node filters annotated VCF files.

fullDescription.intro: The VEPFilter enables the filtering of VCF files based on VEP annotations. The output is a VCF file containing the variants that have passed the filters.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Set a threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
This script is used to filter VEP annotations. It can be found in the VEP installation in ensembl-tools-release../scripts/variant_effect_predictor.
This option enables to select SO terms. Variants that match at least one of the default terms are generally considered as Loss-of-Function variants.

Further filters can be specified. E.g.to find all high confidence LoFs having an ExAC allele frequency larger than 0.05 (LoF is HC,ExAC_AF>0.05). (This requires the usage of the VEP plugins LOFTEE and ExAC).
For more information, see http://www.ensembl.org/info/docs/tools/vep/script/vep_filter.html

ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to filtered VCF file.
